title: Learning-Based Instructional Simulation for Strengthening Innovation Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and practical experience in educational settings
context.additional_context: Training for current practitioners aiming to innovate elementary mathematics education in multicultural settings

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three math education innovation ideas using open-minded thinking and humble behavior in simulation environments reflecting diverse cultural backgrounds
Learners can quantitatively analyze how individual learning competencies influence innovation implementation feasibility through VR-based situational tasks
Learners can measure and explain the impact of their open-mindedness (OM) and humble behavior on learning processes using self-assessment tools through project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
